name: European Engine Power Plants Association
membership:
EUGINE is hosted and organised by VDMA.
Membership: European Energy Forum
memberOrga: Companies: ABB Motors & Generators, Caterpillar Energy Solutions, EC Power, GE Power & Water, Liebherr, MAN Diesel & Turbo, Marelli Motori, MTU, Rolls-Royce Power Systems, Wärtsilä
goal: The European Engine Power Plants Association (EUGINE) is the voice of the European engine power plants industry contributing to the development of an affordable, reliable, modern and sustainable European energy system. It is recognised as the centre of knowledge for engine power plant technology and energy market design.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Energy Policy: 2030 Framework for Climate and Energy Policies, Energy Union, Electricity Market Design, Energy Security of Supply, Network Codes, Renewable Energy Sources, Energy Efficiency, Research
